applet.name: CustomClock
applet.title: Custom Clock (incl. Custom Clock Helper)
applet.desc: Graphical items provided through Song Info plugin and Super Date Time plugin is available free of charge, all other functionality in Custom Clock requires a license. Customization via Custom Clock Helper also requires a license. Note that many styles contains combination of graphical items and then it's possible to use the style but you will get a "License required" text instead of the real value. Custom Clock Helper and Custom Clock uses the same license, so you will always get a license for both when buying one of them. Also note that if you don't have a license you might have to temporarily select another style to get access to all the free items, this will restore your configuration to the online styles which contains a bit more free items.
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson
